acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._blsPublicKey: The aggregated BLS public key (G2 point, 256 bytes uncompressed)

params._useEcdsaMode: True for ECDSA mode (testing), false for BLS mode (production)

params.signature: For BLS mode: single aggregated signature (128 bytes G1 point)                  For ECDSA mode: encoded array of individual signatures

submitHeader(uint64,bytes32,bytes32,byte.details: This function maintains the original interface for ECDSA mode

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

addValidator(address).notice: Add a validator (owner only, for ECDSA mode)

blsPublicKey().notice: Aggregated BLS public key (G2 point, 256 bytes uncompressed)

currentPublicKey().notice: Legacy currentPublicKey getter for backwards compatibility

getReceiptsRoot(uint64).notice: Get the receipts root for a height

headerHashes(uint64).notice: Mapping of height to header hash

isBLSAvailable().notice: Check if BLS precompiles are available

isHeaderFinalized(uint64).notice: Check if a header is finalized

receiptsRoots(uint64).notice: Mapping of height to receipts root

removeValidator(address).notice: Remove a validator (owner only, for ECDSA mode)

setBLSPublicKey(bytes).notice: Set the aggregated BLS public key

submitBLSKeyRotation(uint64,bytes,bytes).notice: Submit a BLS key rotation with BLS signature

submitHeader(uint64,bytes32,bytes32,byte.notice: Submit a finalized Tempo header with validator signatures
Submit a finalized header with ECDSA signatures array (backwards compatible)

submitKeyRotation(uint64,bytes,bytes[]).notice: Submit a key rotation signed by the old validator set

threshold().notice: Threshold for ECDSA signatures (2/3 of validators)

useEcdsaMode().notice: Whether to use ECDSA mode (for testing) instead of BLS
